remarks: Congruence and equality.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
statement:
tkgeom.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tkgeom.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tkgeom.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tkgeom.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgcgrcomlr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgcgrcomlr.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgcgrcomlr.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
tgcgrcomlr.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
tgcgrcomlr.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) = ( C .- D ) ) $.
tgcgrneq.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
tgcgrneq $p |- ( ph -> C =/= D ) $.
